Articles.Content:
Send Them Back.zip

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:

1) Click link above

2) Unzip folder

3) Put Send Them Back!.sfs in -snip- -> Kerbal Space Program -> saves -> scenarios.

4) Put Send Them Back!.png in -snip- -> Kerbal Space Program -> saves -> scenarios -> banners

5) Profit!

OVERVIEW:

Benith II successfully became the first station to successfully orbit the Mun. Unfortunately, it was "Bring Your Child to Work Day", so one of the kids there pressed the "Stage" button, and now the crew has no way of getting home. Send them back!

CHALLENGE:

Design the most clever way of rescuing the crew of Benith II. AFter a certain amount of entries, users will get to vote on their favorite design. Most votes wins.

ACHIEVEMENTS:

Grand Prize: Get the most votes in the voting.

Simplicity: Use the least parts in your design out of all of the designs.

KILL THE COMPUTER: Use the most parts in your design out of all the designs.

Can't Stop: Use SRBs and RCS as your only means of propulsion.

Bring All The Things: Rescue the crew & the debris.

One Stage: Have only one stage in your design.

Good luck!
